name: Spooky Bash
description:
Once upon a midnight dreary While I pondered, weak and weary Over things which I abhor I conceived an inspiration To settle that persistent question As to whether there be zombies anymore And thus I vowed to go and get 'em Bash 'em, smash 'em, unrelentin' Only this, and nothing more

Use your standard keyboard arrow keys to move Spooky, or tap/click the arrow buttons.  Use your keyboard space bar to make Spooky trade places with his shadow, or the action (asterisk) button. Use the escape key or Undo Move menu option to undo moves.
